name: Cube Clicker
description:
Click the correct quadrants on cubes before the timer runs out!

If you don't kill the regular enemy, a boss will spawn that is more difficult to kill.

This is a very early prototype of a game I want to continue to develop.The plan is to add different shaped enemies (which will induce a name change for the game), various enemy types of each shape,  enemy levels, quests, worldwide leaderboard, and more!

Downloading my game and telling me what I can do would mean the world to me

Also thanks to https://soundcloud.com/rezoner for the awesome in game song! Be sure to check him out
